forbidden.heading: You have not been authorized to see this page
forbidden.message: Whilst you have successfully signed in you have not been authorised to see this page.
forbidden.resolution: Please try logging in again.
forbidden.help: If you believe this to be in error, please contact the person who invited you to the service.

generic.heading: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
